Reading"]},"extra":{"doubian-id":4512435},"path":"/cn/posts/1984-after-reading/","components":["cn","posts","1984-after-reading"],"summary":"<p>è¿™æœ¬ä¹¦çœ‹äº†å¾ˆä¹…äº†ï¼Œä¸‹é¢è¿™å¥è¯ä¸€ç›´ç¯ç»•åœ¨æˆ‘è„‘ä¸­ï¼Œå§‹ç»ˆä¸èƒ½å¿˜è®°ã€‚</p>\n<blockquote>\n<p>â€œè€å¤§å“¥åœ¨çœ‹ç€ä½ ã€‚â€</p>\n</blockquote>\n","toc":[],"word_count":664,"reading_time":4,"assets":[],"draft":false,"lang":"cn","lower":{"relative_path":"posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler.cn.md","content":"<p>ä¸€ä¸ªä¼˜é›…çš„çˆ¬è™«éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸‹è¿™äº›ä¸œè¥¿ï¼š</p>\n<ul>\n<li>è¯·æ±‚å™¨</li>\n<li>é¡µé¢è§£æå™¨</li>\n<li>é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨</li>\n<li>è°ƒåº¦å™¨</li>\n</ul>\n<span id=\"continue-reading\"></span><h2 id=\"qing-qiu-qi\">è¯·æ±‚å™¨</h2>\n<p>è´Ÿè´£å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"ye-mian-jie-xi-qi\">é¡µé¢è§£æå™¨</h2>\n<p>è´Ÿè´£ä»é¡µé¢ä¸Šè§£æå‡ºç»§ç»­çˆ¬çš„é“¾æ¥ã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"lian-jie-sheng-cheng-qi\">é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨</h2>\n<p>è´Ÿè´£å¤„ç†ç»§ç»­çˆ¬è™«çš„é“¾æ¥å¹¶æ”¾å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"diao-du-qi\">è°ƒåº¦å™¨</h2>\n<p>å†³å®šé“¾æ¥æ˜¯å¦åº”è¯¥è¢«çˆ¬å»çš„æ ¸å¿ƒéƒ¨ä»¶ã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"yi-bu\">å¼‚æ­¥</h2>\n<p>åŒæ—¶æœ‰å¤šä¸ªè¯·æ±‚åœ¨å‘é€ï¼Œå³æ—¶å¼‚æ­¥çˆ¬è™«ã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"dai-ma\">ä»£ç </h2>\n<p>ç›¸å…³ä»£ç å·²ä¸Šä¼ åˆ° <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://github.com/EINDEX/100-line-async-spider\">Github[https://github.com/EINDEX/100-line-async-spider]</a>ã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">import </span><span>aiohttp, asyncio, aiofiles, lxml, pathlib, sys, re, lxml.html\n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">from </span><span>urllib.parse </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">import </span><span>urlparse\n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">from </span><span>pathlib </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">import </span><span>Path\n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">from </span><span>hashlib </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">import </span><span>md5\n</span><span>\n</span><span>MAX_GET, MAX_QUEUE_SIZE, MAX_WORKER </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">10000</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">100</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">20\n</span><span>spider_url_set, spider_content_set </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">set</span><span>(), </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">set</span><span>()\n</span><span>status </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>{</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;success&quot;</span><span>: </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;all&quot;</span><span>: </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;same&quot;</span><span>: </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;same_content&quot;</span><span>:</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>}\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">async </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">fetch</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">url</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">global </span><span>MAX_GET\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>MAX_GET </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt; </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">async with </span><span>aiohttp.ClientSession(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">connector</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span>aiohttp.TCPConnector(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">ssl</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">False</span><span>), </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">timeout</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span>aiohttp.ClientTimeout(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">total</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>)) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">as </span><span>session:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">async with </span><span>session.get(url) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">as </span><span>response:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return await </span><span>response.text()\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">async </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">savefile</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">path</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">data</span><span>):\n</span><span> path </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>Path(path)\n</span><span> path.parent.mkdir(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">parents</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">exist_ok</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">async with </span><span>aiofiles.open(path, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">mode</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;w&#39;</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">as </span><span>f:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">await </span><span>f.write(data)\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">data_analysis</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">data</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">try</span><span>:\n</span><span> html </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>lxml.html.fromstring(data)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>html.xpath(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;//a/@href&#39;</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">except</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>[]\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">url_analysis</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">endpoint</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">urls</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>url </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>urls:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>url </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span>url </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;#&#39; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;javascript&#39; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>url:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif </span><span>url.startswith(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;/&#39;</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>endpoint.endswith(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;/&#39;</span><span>):\n</span><span> endpoint </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>endpoint[:</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">yield </span><span>endpoint </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span>url\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif </span><span>url.endswith(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;.html&#39;</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span>url.endswith(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;.htm&#39;</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span>url.endswith(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;.shtml&#39;</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span>url.endswith(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;/&#39;</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;?&#39; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>url:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">yield </span><span>url\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">path_gene</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">endpoint</span><span>):\n</span><span> result </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>urlparse(endpoint)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">f</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;data/</span><span>{</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;/&quot;</span><span>.join(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">filter</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">lambda </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">x</span><span>:x, result.hostname.split(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;.&quot;</span><span>)))[::</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>])}{result.path</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;/index.html&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>result.path</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">!=</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;/&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;/index.html&quot;</span><span>}{result.query.replace(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;/&quot;</span><span>,</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;&quot;</span><span>)}</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">async </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">queue</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">global </span><span>MAX_GET\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">try</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>url </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>url_iter:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>MAX_GET </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt; </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">await </span><span>queue.put(url)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">except </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">Exception </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">as </span><span>e:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">pass\n</span><span> \n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">async </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">spider</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">name</span><span>,</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">queue</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">global </span><span>MAX_GET, spider_content_set, spider_url_set\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span>MAX_GET </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt; </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">try</span><span>:\n</span><span> endpoint </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= await </span><span>queue.get()\n</span><span> data </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= await </span><span>fetch(endpoint)\n</span><span> md5data </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>md5(data.encode()).hexdigest()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>md5data </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>spider_content_set:\n</span><span> status[</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;same_content&#39;</span><span>] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> MAX_GET </span><span </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> spider_content_set.add(md5data)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">await </span><span>savefile(path_gene(endpoint), data)\n</span><span> asyncio.gather(asyncio.create_task(pushurl(url_analysis(endpoint, data_analysis(data)), queue)), </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">return_exceptions</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">False</span><span>)\n</span><span> status[</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;success&#39;</span><span>] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">except </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">Exception </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">as </span><span>e:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">pass\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">exit</span><span>():\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">print</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;exit&#39;</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>task </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>asyncio.Task.all_tasks():\n</span><span> task.cancel()\n</span><span> sys.exit(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>)\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">async </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">main</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">first_endpoint</span><span>):\n</span><span> queue </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>asyncio.Queue(MAX_QUEUE_SIZE)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">await </span><span>queue.put(first_endpoint)\n</span><span> asyncio.gather(</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">*</span><span>[asyncio.create_task(spider(spider_id,queue)) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>spider_id </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(MAX_WORKER)], </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">return_exceptions</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">False</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">try</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">await </span><span>asyncio.sleep(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">print</span><span>(queue.qsize(), MAX_GET, status)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>MAX_GET </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt;= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or not </span><span>queue.qsize():\n</span><span> exit()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">except</span><span>:\n</span><span> exit()\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>__name__ </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;__main__&quot;</span><span>:\n</span><span> asyncio.run(main(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;https://eindex.me/&#39;</span><span>))\n</span><span> asyncio.get_event_loop().close()\n</span></code></pre>\n","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/","slug":"one-hundred-line-async-crawler","ancestors":["_index.cn.md","posts/_index.cn.md"],"title":"ä¸€ç™¾è¡Œä»£ç å®ç°å¼‚æ­¥çˆ¬è™«","description":null,"updated":null,"date":"2019-09-07T12:17:25+08:00","year":2019,"month":9,"day":7,"taxonomies":{"tags":["Python","Crawler","Async"]},"extra":{},"path":"/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/","components":["cn","posts","one-hundred-line-async-crawler"],"summary":"<p>ä¸€ä¸ªä¼˜é›…çš„çˆ¬è™«éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸‹è¿™äº›ä¸œè¥¿ï¼š</p>\n<ul>\n<li>è¯·æ±‚å™¨</li>\n<li>é¡µé¢è§£æå™¨</li>\n<li>é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨</li>\n<li>è°ƒåº¦å™¨</li>\n</ul>\n","toc":[{"level":2,"id":"qing-qiu-qi","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/#qing-qiu-qi","title":"è¯·æ±‚å™¨","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"ye-mian-jie-xi-qi","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/#ye-mian-jie-xi-qi","title":"é¡µé¢è§£æå™¨","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"lian-jie-sheng-cheng-qi","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/#lian-jie-sheng-cheng-qi","title":"é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"diao-du-qi","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/#diao-du-qi","title":"è°ƒåº¦å™¨","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"yi-bu","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/#yi-bu","title":"å¼‚æ­¥","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"dai-ma","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/#dai-ma","title":"ä»£ç ","children":[]}],"word_count":466,"reading_time":3,"assets":[],"draft":false,"lang":"cn","lower":null,"higher":null,"translations":[{"lang":"cn","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler/","title":"ä¸€ç™¾è¡Œä»£ç å®ç°å¼‚æ­¥çˆ¬è™«","path":"/home/runner/work/blog/blog/content/posts/one-hundred-line-async-crawler.cn.md"}],"backlinks":[]},"higher":{"relative_path":"p index:</p>\n<table><thead><tr><th>term</th><th>posting list</th></tr></thead><tbody>\n<tr><td>å°</td><td>[1, 2]</td></tr>\n<tr><td>ä»“</td><td>[2, çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿åœ¨å“ª?</li>\n<li>å½“æœ‰1äº¿ Term æ—¶å¦‚ä½•é«˜æ•ˆæŸ¥è¯¢?</li>\n<li>è”åˆæŸ¥è¯¢æ€ä¹ˆåŠ?</li>\n<li>ç›¸å…³åº¦æ’åº?</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"term-index\">Term index</h2>\n<p>å‡è±¡ä¸€ä¸‹æˆ‘ä»¬ç°åœ¨æœ‰ 1 äº¿ä¸ª term, é‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ª trem dictionary ä¼šå å¤šå°‘å†…å­˜å‘¢?\nå‡è®¾æ¯ä¸ª trem å ç”¨å†…å­˜ 6 byte, é‚£ä¹ˆäº¿ä¸ªå¤§çº¦å ç”¨ 0.6 GB, é‚£ä¹ˆå¦‚æœæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªéå¸¸å¤æ‚çš„æ–‡æ¡£, å²‚ä¸æ˜¯å†…å­˜ä¸å¤Ÿç”¨?\nè€Œä¸”ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæœç´¢å¼•æ“çš„é€Ÿåº¦è¿œè¿œå¿«äºMySQL çš„ç´¢å¼•é€Ÿåº¦?</p>\n<p>é¦–å…ˆ Trem Index å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯ä¸€ç§å­—å…¸æ ‘(å‰ç¼€æ ‘), å¯ä»¥å°† term dictionary é‡Œçš„å†…å®¹ç»„æˆæ ‘çŠ¶ç»“æ„.\nä¸‹å›¾ä¼šæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™®é€šçš„å­—å…¸æ ‘. \n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/inverted-index/media/15669198838069/15673442795943.jpg\" alt=\"\" /></p>\n<p>è€Œ Term Index term dictonary.</p>\n<p>å¿«äº MySQL çš„ä¸»è¦åŸå› æ˜¯, å‡å°‘äº†è®¿é—®ç£ç›˜çš„æ¬¡æ•°.MySQL çš„B+æ ‘ä¼šåœ¨ç£ç›˜ä¸­å¤šæ¬¡è¯»å†™ä¸åŒä½ç½®, è€Œä½¿ç”¨ term index , åˆ™åªä¼šåœ¨åŒ¹é…åˆ° term æ—¶è¿›è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ç£ç›˜è®¿é—®.</p>\n<h2 id=\"lian-he-cha-xun\">è”åˆæŸ¥è¯¢</h2>\n<p>å¦‚ä½•è¿›è¡Œç´¢å¼•çš„è”åˆæŸ¥è¯¢, å½“ç¨‹åºè·å¾—å¤šä¸ªPosting list é‚£ä¹ˆç¨‹åºéœ€è¦ä»list id=\"continue-reading\"></span>\n<p>åœ¨ä¹¦ä¸­çš„é‚£ä¸ªæ—¶ä»£ï¼Œ æ˜¯ä¸ªåä¹Œæ‰˜é‚¦çš„ç¤¾ä¼šï¼Œ è¿™ä¸ªç¤¾ä¼šæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå«åšè€å¤§å“¥çš„ç»Ÿæ²»è€…ã€‚å››å¤„éƒ½è´´ç€è€å¤§å“¥çš„è‚–åƒï¼Œ å¤§å®¶å´‡æ‹œç€è¿™ä¸ªå«åšè€å¤§å“¥çš„é¢†è¢–ã€‚</p>\n<p>é‚£ä¸ªç¤¾ä¼šä¸­å­˜åœ¨è¿™æ ·ä¸€å¥å£å·: â€œæˆ˜äº‰å³å’Œå¹³ï¼›è‡ªç”±å³å¥´å½¹ï¼›æ— çŸ¥å³åŠ›é‡ã€‚â€ çœ‹ç€å°±è§‰å¾—éå¸¸å‰å®³ï¼Œè¯»å®Œä¹‹ååœ¨çœ‹è¿™å¥è¯ï¼Œ æ›´èƒ½ç†è§£å…¶ä¸­çš„æ·±æ„ã€‚</p>\n<p>æ–‡ä¸­ä»¥ä¸€ä¸ªå°èŒå‘˜ä¸»äººå…¬æ¸©æ–¯é¡¿çš„æ—¥å¸¸ç”Ÿæ´»ï¼Œå¸¦é¢†æˆ‘ä»¬è¿›å…¥ã€Š1984ã€‹çš„ä¸–ç•Œã€‚è€å¤§å“¥æ§åˆ¶æ€æƒ³ã€è€å¤§å“¥æ°¸è¿œæ­£ç¡®ã€è€å¤§å“¥åˆ›é€ äº†å†å²ï¼Œè€å¤§å“¥æ˜¯äººæ°‘çš„æ•‘æ˜Ÿã€‚å½“ç„¶ä¹Ÿæœ‰åå¯¹è€å¤§å“¥çš„äººï¼Œæƒ³æ¨ç¿»å›½å®¶æ”¿æƒçš„äººã€‚</p>\n<p>è€Œæˆ‘ä»¬çš„ä¸»äººå…¬å› ä¸ºæœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼Œè´Ÿè´£ä¿®æ”¹å†å²è®°å½•ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä»–çŠ¯ä¸‹äº†æ€æƒ³ç½ªï¼Œè¿æ¥ä»–çš„å°±æ˜¯æ­»äº¡ã€‚å› ä¸ºâ€œæ€æƒ³ç½ªä¸ä¼šå¸¦æ¥æ­»äº¡ï¼Œæ€æƒ³ç½ªæœ¬èº«å°±æ˜¯æ­»äº¡ã€‚â€</p>\n<p>ä¹‹åæ¸©æ–¯é¡¿é‡åˆ°äº†çˆ±æƒ…ï¼Œä»¥åŠçœŸæ­£çš„æ€§ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶åŠ å…¥åˆ°äº†åè€å¤§å“¥çš„ç»„ç»‡ã€‚ä»–è¯»åˆ°åå…šé¢†è¢–æ‰€å†™çš„ã€Šå¯¡å¤´æ”¿æ²»é›†ä½“ä¸»ä¹‰çš„ç†è®ºä¸å®è·µã€‹ï¼Œä»–è¯»åˆ°è¿™æœ¬ä¹¦å…³é”®ä¹‹å¤„ï¼Œè¢«æ€æƒ³è­¦å¯Ÿæ´»æ‰ã€‚</p>\n<p>åœ¨ç›‘ç‹±ï¼Œåå¤è¢«æ‹·æ‰“ï¼Œè¢«æ”¹é€ ï¼Œåªæœ‰ç›¸ä¿¡è€å¤§å“¥çš„äººæ‰èƒ½çœŸæ­£çš„å‡ºç‹±ã€‚</p>\n<p>ä»–ä¹Ÿå‡ºç‹±äº†ï¼Œä»–æ”¾å¼ƒäº†è‡ªå·±çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼Œä»–æ­»å»äº†ã€‚</p>\n<p>è¿™æœ¬ä¹¦é‡Œé¢è¿˜æœ‰å‡ å¥ç»å…¸çš„è¯è¯­ï¼š</p>\n<blockquote>\n<p>è°æ§åˆ¶è¿‡å»ï¼Œè°å°±æ§åˆ¶æœªæ¥ï¼›è°æ§åˆ¶ç°åœ¨ï¼Œè°å°±æ§åˆ¶è¿‡å»ã€‚</p>\n</blockquote>\n<blockquote>\n<p>å¯è®¤ä¸ºè‡ªäººç§°ä¹‹ä¸ºäººä»¥æ¥ï¼Œä¾¿æœ‰ä¸‰ç­‰äººã€‚ ä¸Šç­‰äººï¼Œä¸­ç­‰äººå’Œä¸‹ç­‰äººã€‚è¿™ä¸‰ç§äººçš„ç›®æ ‡å®Œå…¨ä¸å¯è°ƒå’Œã€‚ä¸Šç­‰äººçš„ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯è¦ä¿æŒä»–ä»¬çš„åœ°ä½ã€‚ä¸­ç­‰äººçš„ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯è¦åŒé«˜ç­‰äººäº¤æ¢åœ°ä½ã€‚ä¸‹ç­‰äººåŠ³è‹¦ä¹‹ä½™æ— æš‡æ—é¡¾ï¼Œè‹¥è¯´æœ‰ç›®æ ‡çš„è¯ï¼Œæ— éæ˜¯å–æ¶ˆä¸€åˆ‡å·®åˆ«ï¼Œå»ºç«‹ä¸€ä¸ªäººäººå¹³ç­‰çš„ç¤¾ä¼šã€‚</p>\n</blockquote>\n<p>è¿™ä¹¦å†™äº1949å¹´ï¼Œ é¢„è¨€çš„æ˜¯è‹±å›½40å¹´åçš„æ ·å­ï¼Œä¹¦ä¸­æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ²¡æœ‰è‡ªç”±ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰æ€æƒ³ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰éšç§çš„ç¤¾ä¼šã€‚</p>\n<p>è°ä¹Ÿæƒ³ä¸åˆ°ï¼Œåœ¨70å¹´åçš„ä»Šå¤©ï¼Œç½‘ç»œæš´åŠ›å››å¤„æ¨ªè¡Œï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¯ä¸ªäººéƒ½åœ¨è°¨è¨€æ…è¡Œï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªäººéƒ½åœ¨ç”¨è‡ªå·±çš„æ€æƒ³å¼ºåŠ äºä»–äººã€‚</p>\n<p>æˆ‘ä»¬è¿™ä¸ªç¤¾ä¼šè‡ªç”±å—ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦è‡ªç”±å—ï¼Ÿè‡ªç”±çš„å®šä¹‰æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ</p>\n<p>â€œè€å¤§å“¥åœ¨çœ‹ç€ä½ ï¼â€</p>\n","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/1984-after-reading/","slug":"1984-after-reading","ancestors":["_index.cn.md","posts/_index.cn.md"],"title":"1984","description":null,"updated":null,"date":"2019-09-02T23:28:58+08:00","year":2019,"month":9,"day":2,"taxonomies":{"tags":["After Reading"]},"extra":{"doubian-id":4512435},"path":"/cn/posts/1984-after-reading/","components":["cn","posts","1984-after-reading"],"summary":"<p>è¿™æœ¬ä¹¦çœ‹äº†å¾ˆä¹…äº†ï¼Œä¸‹é¢è¿™å¥è¯ä¸€ç›´ç¯ç»•åœ¨æˆ‘è„‘ä¸­ï¼Œå§‹ç»ˆä¸èƒ½å¿˜è®°ã€‚</p>\n<blockquote>\n<p>â€œè€å¤§å“¥åœ¨çœ‹ç€ä½ ã€‚â€</p>\n</blockquote>\n","toc":[],"word_count":664,"reading_time":4,"assets":[],"draft":false,"lang":"cn","lower":null,"higher":null,"translations":[{"lang":"cn","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/1984-after-reading/","title":"1984","path":"/home/runner/work/blog/blog/content/posts/1984-after-reading.cn.md"}],"backlinks":[]},"higher":{"relative_path":"posts/tornado-auto-etag.cn.md","content":"<p>ä¸ºäº†ç ”ç©¶ç¼“å­˜çœ‹äº† tornado <code>web.py</code> é‡Œçš„ <code>finish</code> å‡½æ•°</p>\n<span id=\"continue-reading\"></span>\n<p>ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">finish</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">chunk</span><span>: Union[</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">str</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">bytes</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">dict</span><span>] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>) -&gt; </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Future[None]&quot;</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;Finishes this response, ending the HTTP request.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Passing a ``chunk`` to ``finish()`` is equivalent to passing that\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> chunk to ``write()`` and then calling ``finish()`` with no arguments.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Returns a `.Future` which may optionally be awaited to track the sending\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> of the response to the client. This `.Future` resolves when all the response\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> data has been sent, and raises an error if the connection is closed before all\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> data can be sent.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> .. versionchanged:: 5.1\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Now returns a `.Future` instead of ``None``.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self._finished:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">raise </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">RuntimeError</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;finish() called twice&quot;</span><span>)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>chunk </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> self.write(chunk)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># Automatically support ETags and add the Content-Length header if\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># we have not flushed any content yet.\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self._headers_written:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>(\n</span><span> self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">200\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>self.request.method </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;GET&quot;</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;HEAD&quot;</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Etag&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">not in </span><span>self._headers\n</span><span> ):\n</span><span> self.set_etag_header()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self.check_etag_header():\n</span><span> self._write_buffer </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> self.set_status(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">304</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">204</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">304</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span>(\n</span><span> self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt;= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">100 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt; </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">200\n</span><span> ):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">assert not </span><span>self._write_buffer, (\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Cannot send body with </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">%s</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">% </span><span>self._status_code\n</span><span> )\n</span><span> self._clear_headers_for_304()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Content-Length&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">not in </span><span>self._headers:\n</span><span> content_length </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">sum</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(part) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>part </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>self._write_buffer)\n</span><span> self.set_header(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Content-Length&quot;</span><span>, content_length)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">assert </span><span>self.request.connection </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># Now that the request is finished, clear the callback we\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># set on the HTTPConnection (which would otherwise prevent the\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># garbage collection of the RequestHandler when there\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># are keepalive connections)\n</span><span> self.request.connection.set_close_callback(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># type: ignore\n</span><span>\n</span><span> future </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>self.flush(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">include_footers</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True</span><span>)\n</span><span> self.request.connection.finish()\n</span><span> self._log()\n</span><span> self._finished </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True\n</span><span> self.on_finish()\n</span><span> self._break_cycles()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>future\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>ä»ä»£ç ä¸­å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡º, æ»¡è¶³ä¸‹é¢æ¡ä»¶çš„è¯·æ±‚:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><code>self._headers_written</code> ä¸ºä¸ä¸º<code>True</code> </li>\n<li>http status ä¸º <code>200</code> çš„ <code>GET</code>ã€ <code>HEAD</code> è¯·æ±‚</li>\n<li>åŒæ—¶æ²¡æœ‰ <code>Etag</code> åœ¨ <code>response header</code> çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹</li>\n</ul>\n<p>tornado ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è®¡ç®—è¿”å›ç»“æœçš„ sha1, å¹¶è®¾ç½® Etag è‹¥å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ”¯æŒ Etag æœºåˆ¶, æ­£ç¡®è¿”å› <code>If-None-Match</code>, å°±èƒ½èŠ‚çº¦ä¸€æ³¢æµé‡, ç¾æ»‹æ»‹.</p>\n","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tornado-auto-etag/","slug":"tornado-auto-etag","ancestors":["_index.cn.md","posts/_index.cn.md"],"title":"Tornado Auto Etag å‡½æ•°</p>\n","toc":[],"word_count":357,"reading_time":2,"assets":[],"draft":false,"lang":"cn","lower":null,"higher":null,"translations":[{"lang":"cn","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tornado-auto-etag/","title":"Tornado æœºåˆ¶","path":"/home/runner/work/blog/blog/content/posts/tornado-auto-etag.cn.md"}],"backlinks":[]},"translations":[{"lang":"cn","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/inverted-index/","title":"å€’æ’ç´¢å¼•","path":"/home/runner/work/blog/blog/content/posts/inverted-index.cn.md"}],"backlinks":[]},{"relative_path":"posts/tornado-auto-etag.cn.md","content":"<p>ä¸ºäº†ç ”ç©¶ç¼“å­˜çœ‹äº† tornado <code>web.py</code> é‡Œçš„ <code>finish</code> å‡½æ•°</p>\n<span id=\"continue-reading\"></span>\n<p>ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">finish</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">chunk</span><span>: Union[</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">str</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">bytes</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">dict</span><span>] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>) -&gt; </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Future[None]&quot;</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;Finishes this response, ending the HTTP request.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Passing a ``chunk`` to ``finish()`` is equivalent to passing that\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> chunk to ``write()`` and then calling ``finish()`` with no arguments.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Returns a `.Future` which may optionally be awaited to track the sending\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> of the response to the client. This `.Future` resolves when all the response\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> data has been sent, and raises an error if the connection is closed before all\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> data can be sent.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> .. versionchanged:: 5.1\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Now returns a `.Future` instead of ``None``.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self._finished:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">raise </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">RuntimeError</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;finish() called twice&quot;</span><span>)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>chunk </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> self.write(chunk)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># Automatically support ETags and add the Content-Length header if\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># we have not flushed any content yet.\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self._headers_written:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>(\n</span><span> self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">200\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>self.request.method </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;GET&quot;</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;HEAD&quot;</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Etag&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">not in </span><span>self._headers\n</span><span> ):\n</span><span> self.set_etag_header()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self.check_etag_header():\n</span><span> self._write_buffer </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> self.set_status(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">304</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">204</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">304</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span>(\n</span><span> self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt;= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">100 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt; </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">200\n</span><span> ):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">assert not </span><span>self._write_buffer, (\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Cannot send body with </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">%s</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">% </span><span>self._status_code\n</span><span> )\n</span><span> self._clear_headers_for_304()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Content-Length&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">not in </span><span>self._headers:\n</span><span> content_length </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">sum</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(part) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>part </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>self._write_buffer)\n</span><span> self.set_header(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Content-Length&quot;</span><span>, content_length)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">assert </span><span>self.request.connection </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># Now that the request is finished, clear the callback we\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># set on the HTTPConnection (which would otherwise prevent the\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># garbage collection of the RequestHandler when there\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># are keepalive connections)\n</span><span> self.request.connection.set_close_callback(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># type: ignore\n</span><span>\n</span><span> future </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>self.flush(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">include_footers</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True</span><span>)\n</span><span> self.request.connection.finish()\n</span><span> self._log()\n</span><span> self._finished </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True\n</span><span> self.on_finish()\n</span><span> self._break_cycles()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>future\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>ä»ä»£ç ä¸­å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡º, æ»¡è¶³ä¸‹é¢æ¡ä»¶çš„è¯·æ±‚:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><code>self._headers_written</code> ä¸ºä¸ä¸º<code>True</code> </li>\n<li>http status ä¸º <code>200</code> çš„ <code>GET</code>ã€ <code>HEAD</code> è¯·æ±‚</li>\n<li>åŒæ—¶æ²¡æœ‰ <code>Etag</code> åœ¨ <code>response header</code> çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹</li>\n</ul>\n<p>tornado ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è®¡ç®—è¿”å›ç»“æœçš„ sha1, å¹¶è®¾ç½® Etag è‹¥å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ”¯æŒ Etag æœºåˆ¶, æ­£ç¡®è¿”å› <code>If-None-Match</code>, å°±èƒ½èŠ‚çº¦ä¸€æ³¢æµé‡, ç¾æ»‹æ»‹.</p>\n","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tornado-auto-etag/","slug":"tornado-auto-etag","ancestors":["_index.cn.md","posts/_index.cn.md"],"title":"Tornado Auto Etag åœ¨å®‰è£…ä¹‹åä¼šåœ¨å½“å‰ç›®å½•ä¸Šç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ª Pipfile ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ä¸åœ¨æ˜¯åƒ requestments.txt é‚£æ ·çš„çº¯ç²¹çš„æ–‡æœ¬ç»“æ„ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥äº†ä¸€äº›é…ç½®å†…å®¹ã€‚</p>\n<p>æ¯”å¦‚è¯´å¯ä»¥é…ç½®ä½¿ç”¨çš„ pipy æºï¼ŒPython ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼Œä»¥åŠåŒ…ç®¡ç†ã€‚\nPipenv çš„åŒ…ç®¡ç†æ¯”å…¶ä»–çš„æœ‰ç‚¹åœ¨äºå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­æŒ‡å®š æ­£å¼è¿è¡Œ packages å’Œ å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒä¸­çš„ tornado <code>web.py</code> é‡Œçš„ <code>finish</code> å‡½æ•°</p>\n<span id=\"continue-reading\"></span>\n<p>ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">finish</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">chunk</span><span>: Union[</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">str</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">bytes</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">dict</span><span>] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>) -&gt; </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Future[None]&quot;</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;Finishes this response, ending the HTTP request.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Passing a ``chunk`` to ``finish()`` is equivalent to passing that\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> chunk to ``write()`` and then calling ``finish()`` with no arguments.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Returns a `.Future` which may optionally be awaited to track the sending\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> of the response to the client. This `.Future` resolves when all the response\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> data has been sent, and raises an error if the connection is closed before all\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> data can be sent.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> .. versionchanged:: 5.1\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> Now returns a `.Future` instead of ``None``.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self._finished:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">raise </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">RuntimeError</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;finish() called twice&quot;</span><span>)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>chunk </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> self.write(chunk)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># Automatically support ETags and add the Content-Length header if\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># we have not flushed any content yet.\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self._headers_written:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>(\n</span><span> self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">200\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>self.request.method </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;GET&quot;</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;HEAD&quot;</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Etag&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">not in </span><span>self._headers\n</span><span> ):\n</span><span> self.set_etag_header()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self.check_etag_header():\n</span><span> self._write_buffer </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> self.set_status(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">304</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">204</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">304</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span>(\n</span><span> self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt;= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">100 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>self._status_code </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt; </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">200\n</span><span> ):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">assert not </span><span>self._write_buffer, (\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Cannot send body with </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">%s</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">% </span><span>self._status_code\n</span><span> )\n</span><span> self._clear_headers_for_304()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Content-Length&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">not in </span><span>self._headers:\n</span><span> content_length </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">sum</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(part) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>part </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>self._write_buffer)\n</span><span> self.set_header(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&quot;Content-Length&quot;</span><span>, content_length)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">assert </span><span>self.request.connection </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># Now that the request is finished, clear the callback we\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># set on the HTTPConnection (which would otherwise prevent the\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># garbage collection of the RequestHandler when there\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># are keepalive connections)\n</span><span> self.request.connection.set_close_callback(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># type: ignore\n</span><span>\n</span><span> future </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>self.flush(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">include_footers</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True</span><span>)\n</span><span> self.request.connection.finish()\n</span><span> self._log()\n</span><span> self._finished </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True\n</span><span> ã€‚\næœ¬ç®—æ³•å¯¹å¾…åŒ¹é…å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åšå¤„ç†ä¹‹åï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°ä»–çš„çœŸå‰ç¼€å’ŒçœŸåç¼€ã€‚å¹¶é€šè¿‡çœŸå‰ç¼€ä¸åç¼€é‡åˆçš„æ•°é‡çš„å€¼ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå€¼æ˜¯åœ¨åŒ¹é…çŠ¶æ€ä¸­å‘ç”ŸçŸ¢é…æ—¶ï¼Œä½äºåŸå§‹å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸Š S çš„æŒ‡é’ˆç§»åŠ¨çš„æ–¹å‘ä¸è·ç¦»ã€‚</p>\n<p>ç®€å•çš„è¯´å°±æ˜¯åŒ¹é…å¤±è´¥æ—¶ã€‚é€šè¿‡ä¹‹å‰çš„çœŸå‰ç¼€å’Œåç¼€è¡¨ï¼Œç›´æ¥ç§»åŠ¨åœ¨åŒ¹é…å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸Šçš„æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œè¾¾åˆ°å‡å°‘æ— ç”¨åŒ¹é…çš„æ•ˆæœã€‚</p>\n<h2 O(m)çš„ç©ºé—´ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªç©ºé—´æ˜¯ç”¨æ¥ä¿å­˜çœŸå‰ç¼€å’ŒçœŸåç¼€çš„ç»“æœçš„ã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"shi-xian\">å®ç°</h2>\n<p>KMP åŒ¹é…çš„å…³é”®åœ¨äºåˆå§‹åŒ–åŒ¹é…å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">partial_table</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">pattern</span><span>:</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">str</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> å½“å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ä¸º1çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦è¿›è¡ŒæŸ¥è¡¨ï¼Œç›´æ¥å¾ªç¯åŒ¹é…æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦å°±æ˜¯ O(n)\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> front </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[pattern[:x</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(pattern))]\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">cal_table_val</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">sub_pattern</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">max</span><span>([</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>]</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+</span><span>[</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(front[:i]) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(sub_pattern)) </span><span </span><span>front[:i]])\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>[cal_table_val(pattern[:i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span </span><span>string:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return -</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> \n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># åŒ¹é…å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ä¸º1 ä¸éœ€è¦å»ºè¡¨\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>i\n</span><span> res.append(i)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> pt </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0\n</span><span> lp, ls </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(pattern), </span><span </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== ç®—æ³•","description":null,"updated":null,"date":"2018-05-11T14:32:26+08:00","year":2018,"month":5,"day":11,"taxonomies":{"tags":["KMP","Python"],"series":["algorithm"]},"extra":{},"path":"/cn/posts/kmp/","components":["cn","posts","kmp"],"summary":"<blockquote>\n<p>åœ¨è®¡ç®—æœºç§‘å­¦ä¸­ï¼ŒKnuth-Morris-Prattå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æŸ¥æ‰¾ç®—æ³•ï¼ˆç®€ç§°ä¸ºKMPç®—æ³•ï¼‰å¯åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªä¸»æ–‡æœ¬å­—ç¬¦ä¸²Så†…æŸ¥æ‰¾ä¸€ä¸ªè¯Wçš„å‡ºç°ä½ç½®ã€‚æ­¤ç®—æ³•é€šè¿‡è¿ç”¨å¯¹è¿™ä¸ªè¯åœ¨ä¸åŒ¹é…æ—¶æœ¬èº«å°±åŒ…å«è¶³å¤Ÿçš„ä¿¡æ¯æ¥ç¡®å®šä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ¹é…å°†åœ¨å“ªé‡Œå¼€å§‹çš„å‘ç°ï¼Œä»è€Œé¿å…é‡æ–°æ£€æŸ¥å…ˆå‰åŒ¹é…çš„å­—ç¬¦ã€‚</p>\n</blockquote>\n","toc":[{"level":2,"id":"yuan-li","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/kmp/#yuan-li","title":"åŸç†","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"you-dian","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/kmp/#you-dian","title":"ä¼˜ç‚¹","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"shi-xian","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/kmp/#shi-xian","title":"å®ç°","children":[]}],"word_count":633,"reading_time":4,"assets":[],"draft":false,"lang":"cn","lower":{"relative_path":"posts/pipenv-autoenv.cn.md","content":"<p>Python åŒ…ç®¡ç†ä¸€ç›´éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¦‚ä»Š 3.6 æ¨èé‡‡ç”¨ Pipenv å‡ºè‡ª Requests çš„å¤§ç‰›åšæ‰€ã€‚é…åˆä¸Šä»–å†™çš„ Autoenv åˆ‡æ¢ç¯å¢ƒå†ä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯é—®é¢˜ã€‚</p>\n<span id=\"continue-reading\"></span><h2 id=\"an-zhuang\">å®‰è£…</h2>\n<h3 id=\"macos\">MacOS</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"bash\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-bash \"><code class=\"language-bash\" åœ¨å®‰è£…ä¹‹åä¼šåœ¨å½“å‰ç›®å½•ä¸Šç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ª Pipfile ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ä¸åœ¨æ˜¯åƒ requestments.txt é‚£æ ·çš„çº¯ç²¹çš„æ–‡æœ¬ç»“æ„ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥äº†ä¸€äº›é…ç½®å†…å®¹ã€‚</p>\n<p>æ¯”å¦‚è¯´å¯ä»¥é…ç½®ä½¿ç”¨çš„ pipy æºï¼ŒPython ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼Œä»¥åŠåŒ…ç®¡ç†ã€‚\nPipenv çš„åŒ…ç®¡ç†æ¯”å…¶ä»–çš„æœ‰ç‚¹åœ¨äºå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­æŒ‡å®š æ­£å¼è¿è¡Œ packages å’Œ å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒä¸­çš„ packagesï¼Œç®¡ç†ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶æ¯”ç®¡ç†å¤šä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬æ–‡ä»¶çš„å¥½å¤„ä¸è¨€è€Œå–»ã€‚</p>\n<p>åŒæ—¶ pip åŠ å…¥äº† pip install -p Pipfile æ¥æ”¯æŒ Pipenvï¼Œå®˜æ–¹éƒ½æ”¯æŒäº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜ç­‰ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Œç”¨ç”¨ç”¨ã€‚</p>\n<p>å…·ä½“å†…å®¹è¯¦è§å®˜æ–¹ <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://github.com/pypa/pipenv\">Github</a>ã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"autoenv\">Autoenv</h2>\n<p>æ—¢ç„¶ Pipenv éƒ½è¿™ä¹ˆå¼ºå¤§äº†ï¼Œè‡ªç„¶ä¼šå¯¼è‡´è™šæ‹Ÿç¯å¢ƒæ»¡å¤©é£ï¼Œä¸æ–¹ä¾¿è¿›å…¥è™šæ‹Ÿç¯å¢ƒçš„æ—¶å€™æ€ä¹ˆåŠã€‚\nè¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™å°±éœ€è¦ Autoenv ç™»åœºäº†ã€‚</p>\n<h3 autoenv)/activate.sh&quot; </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt;&gt; </span><span>~/.bash_profile\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>ä»–èƒ½åœ¨è¿›å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ç›®å½•çš„æ—¶å€™è‡ªåŠ¨è¿›å…¥è™šæ‹Ÿç¯å¢ƒï¼Œå½“ç„¶å‰ææ˜¯ä½ éœ€è¦å°†è™šæ‹Ÿç¯å¢ƒè·¯å¾„åŠ å…¥<code>.env</code>æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶å°†è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶æ”¾åœ¨é¡¹ç›®æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹ï¼Œè¿™æ ·åœ¨è¿›å…¥ç›®å½•æ—¶ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡å…¥åˆ°ç¯å¢ƒä¸­ã€‚</p>\n<p>èŠ‚çº¦æ—¶é—´ä¸ç”Ÿå‘½ï¼ŒPython <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A0%91_(%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%84)\">æ ‘(æ•°æ®ç»“æ„)</a></p>\n<h2 id=\"ding-yi-shu-ju-jie-gou\">å®šä¹‰æ•°æ®ç»“æ„</h2>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__init__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">value</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">children</span><span>: </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :param value: èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :param children: èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ª TreeNode çš„åˆ—è¡¨\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span>\n</span><span> self.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>value\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>children:\n</span><span> self.children </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif not </span><span>self.value:\n</span><span> self.children </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> self.children </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>children\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">class </span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;color:#a6e22e;\">Tree</span><span>(</span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;font-style:italic;color:#a6e22e;\">object</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘ï¼šåŸºæœ¬æ ‘çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__init__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>: TreeNode </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> ä¼ å…¥æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :param root: å¦‚æœä¸º TreeNode ä¸ºæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œ å¦‚æœä¸º None ä¸ºç©ºä¹¦\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>(root </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(root, TreeNode)):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">raise </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">AttributeError</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;illegal root&#39;</span><span>)\n</span><span> self.root </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>root\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qian-xu-bian-li\">å‰åºéå†</h2>\n<p>å…ˆéå†æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚åœ¨éå†å­©å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚\n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E5%89%8D%E5%BA%8F%E9%81%8D%E5%8E%86.jpg\" alt=\"å‰åºéå†\" /></p>\n<h3 id=\"xun-huan-ban\">å¾ªç¯ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">preorder_traversal_while</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„å‰åºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span> stack </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[self.root]\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack.pop()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children[::</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>]:\n</span><span> stack.append(sub_node)\n</span><span> res.append(node.value)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span></code></pre>\n<h3 id=\"di-gui-ban\">é€’å½’ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">preorder_traversal_recursion</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„å‰åºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>):\n</span><span> inner_res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>root.value:\n</span><span> inner_res.append(root.value)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> inner_res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span>_inner(sub_node)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>inner_res\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"hou-xu-bian-li\">ååºéå†</h2>\n<p>å…ˆéå†å­©å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæœ€åéå†æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚</p>\n<p><img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E5%90%8E%E5%BA%8F%E9%81%8D%E5%8E%86.jpg\" alt=\"ååºéå†\" /></p>\n<h3 id=\"xun-huan-ban-1\">å¾ªç¯ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">postorder_traversal_while</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„ååºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> stack </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[self.root]\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack.pop()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children:\n</span><span> stack.append(sub_node)\n</span><span> res.append(node.value)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res[::</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>]\n</span></code></pre>\n<h3 id=\"di-gui-ban-1\">é€’å½’ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">postorder_traversal_recursion</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„ååºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>):\n</span><span> inner_res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>root.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> inner_res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span>_inner(sub_node)\n</span><span> inner_res.append(root.value)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>inner_res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span><span>\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"ceng-ci-bian-li\">å±‚æ¬¡éå†</h2>\n<p>æŒ‰å±‚éå†èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚\n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E5%B1%82%E5%BA%8F%E9%81%8D%E5%8E%86.jpg\" alt=\"å±‚åºéå†\" /></p>\n<h3 id=\"xun-huan-ban-2\">å¾ªç¯ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">layer_while</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„å±‚åºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> queue </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>Queue()\n</span><span> queue.put(self.root)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span>queue.qsize():\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>queue.get()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> res.append(node.value)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children:\n</span><span> queue.put(sub_node)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-shu-de-shen-du\">æ±‚æ ‘çš„æ·±åº¦</h2>\n<p>è®¡ç®—æ ‘çš„æœ€å¤§æ·±åº¦ã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">depth_recursion</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">depth</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>depth\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">max</span><span>([_inner(sub_node, depth</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children])\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-shu-de-jie-dian-shu\">æ±‚æ ‘çš„ç»“ç‚¹æ•°</h2>\n<p>è®¡ç®—æ ‘ä¸€å…±æœ‰å¤šå°‘èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">node_count</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">sum</span><span>([_inner(sub_node) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children])\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-shu-de-xie-zi-shu\">æ±‚æ ‘çš„å¶å­æ•°</h2>\n<p>è®¡ç®—ä¹¦ä¸­æœ‰å¤šå°‘æ²¡æœ‰å­©å­çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">leaf_count</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">sum</span><span>([_inner(sub_node) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children])\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-liang-ge-jie-dian-de-zui-di-gong-gong-zu-xian-jie-dian\">æ±‚ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„æœ€ä½å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆç»“ç‚¹</h2>\n<p>é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦åœ¨æ ‘ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ã€‚\nä¿å­˜æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é“¾è¡¨ã€‚\néå†ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨çš„æœ€é•¿å…¬å…±èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå°±èƒ½æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€ä½çš„å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚\n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E6%9C%80%E4%BD%8E%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E7%A5%96%E5%85%88%E8%8A%82%E7%82%B9.jpg\" alt=\"æœ€ä½å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆèŠ‚ç‚¹\" /></p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">lowest_ancestor_node</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node1</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node2</span><span>):\n</span><span> stack </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[self.root]\n</span><span> stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> stack2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and not </span><span>(stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>stack2):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack.pop()\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span>node1:\n</span><span> stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack[:]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span>node2:\n</span><span> stack2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack[:]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children:\n</span><span> stack.append(sub_node)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>self.root\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack1)):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>stack1[i] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span>stack2[i]:\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack1[i]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res.value\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res.value\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-ren-yi-liang-jie-dian-ju-chi\">æ±‚ä»»æ„ä¸¤ç»“ç‚¹è·ç¦»</h2>\n<p>é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦åœ¨æ ‘ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ã€‚\nä¿å­˜æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é“¾è¡¨ã€‚\nåœ¨åˆ¤æ–­å‰©ä½™çš„é•¿åº¦\n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E4%BB%BB%E6%84%8F%E4%B8%A4%E8%8A%82%E7%82%B9%E8%B7%9D%E7%A6%BB.jpg\" alt=\"ä»»æ„ä¸¤èŠ‚ç‚¹è·ç¦»\" /></p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">two_node_distence</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node1</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node2</span><span>):\n</span><span> stack </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[self.root]\n</span><span> stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> stack2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and not </span><span>(stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>stack2):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack.pop()\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span>node1:\n</span><span> stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack[:]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span>node2:\n</span><span> stack2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack[:]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children:\n</span><span> stack.append(sub_node)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>self.root\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack1)):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>stack1[i] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span>stack2[i]:\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack1[i]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack1) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack2) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">*</span><span>i\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack1) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack2) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">*</span><span>i\n</span><span>\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"zong-shu\">ç»¼è¿°</h2>\n<p>ä»¥ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯å’Œæ ‘æœ‰å…³è”çš„ç®€å•ä»£ç ã€‚\nä»¥ä¸Šä»£ç ä¹Ÿåœ¨ Github ä¸Šå‘å¸ƒ <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://github.com/EINDEX/Python-algorithm/blob/master/data_structure/tree/tree.py\">tree</a>ï¼Œ å¦‚æœ‰å·®é”™ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿æäº¤ Issue æˆ– PRã€‚</p>\n<h2 çš„ç»§æ‰¿æ ‘ç­‰ã€‚\nè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€äº›åŸºäºæ ‘çš„ç‰¹æ®Šæ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚äºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼ŒB -ge-jie-dian-de-zui-di-gong-gong-zu-xian-jie-dian","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/#qiu-liang-ge-jie-dian-de-zui-di-gong-gong-zu-xian-jie-dian","title":"æ±‚ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„æœ€ä½å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆç»“ç‚¹","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"qiu-ren-yi-liang-jie-dian-ju-chi","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/#qiu-ren-yi-liang-jie-dian-ju-chi","title":"æ±‚ä»»æ„ä¸¤ç»“ç‚¹è·ç¦»","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"zong-shu","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/#zong-shu","title":"ç»¼è¿°","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"geng-xin","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/#geng-xin","title":"æ›´æ–°","children":[]}],"word_count":1210,"reading_time":7,"assets":[],"draft":false,"lang":"cn","lower":null,"higher":null,"translations":[{"lang":"cn","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/","title":"Tree in Python","path":"/home/runner/work/blog/blog/content/posts/tree-in-python.cn.md"}],"backlinks":[]},"translations":[{"lang":"cn","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/kmp/","title":"KMP ç®—æ³•","path":"/home/runner/work/blog/blog/content/posts/kmp.cn.md"}],"backlinks":[]},{"relative_path":"posts/tree-in-python.cn.md","content":"<p>æ ‘æ˜¯è®¡ç®—æœºç§‘å­¦ä¸­å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¹‹ä¸€,å¸¸è§çš„åœ°æ–¹æœ‰ï¼ŒJava çš„ç»§æ‰¿æ ‘ç­‰ã€‚\nè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€äº›åŸºäºæ ‘çš„ç‰¹æ®Šæ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚äºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼ŒB æ ‘ï¼Œç­‰ç­‰ã€‚</p>\n<p>æœ¬ç¯‡ä¼šè®²è¿°ä¸€äº›å…³äºç®€å•å…³äºæ ‘çš„æ“ä½œã€‚</p>\n<span id=\"continue-reading\"></span><h2 id=\"shu-de-ding-yi\">æ ‘çš„å®šä¹‰</h2>\n<blockquote>\n<p>æ ‘ï¼ˆè‹±è¯­ï¼štreeï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ç§æŠ½è±¡æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼ˆADTï¼‰æˆ–æ˜¯å®ä½œè¿™ç§æŠ½è±¡æ•°æ®ç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œç”¨æ¥æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå…·æœ‰æ ‘çŠ¶ç»“æ„æ€§è´¨çš„æ•°æ®é›†åˆã€‚å®ƒæ˜¯ç”±nï¼ˆn&gt;0ï¼‰ä¸ªæœ‰é™èŠ‚ç‚¹ç»„æˆä¸€ä¸ªå…·æœ‰å±‚æ¬¡å…³ç³»çš„é›†åˆã€‚æŠŠå®ƒå«åšâ€œæ ‘â€æ˜¯å› ä¸ºå®ƒçœ‹èµ·æ¥åƒä¸€æ£µå€’æŒ‚çš„æ ‘ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´å®ƒæ˜¯æ ¹æœä¸Šï¼Œè€Œå¶æœä¸‹çš„ã€‚å®ƒå…·æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹çš„ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š</p>\n</blockquote>\n<blockquote>\n<ul>\n<li>æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æœ‰é›¶ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªå­èŠ‚ç‚¹</li>\n<li>æ²¡æœ‰çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ç§°ä¸ºæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹</li>\n<li>æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªéæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹æœ‰ä¸”åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹</li>\n<li>é™¤äº†æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤–ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºå¤šä¸ªä¸ç›¸äº¤çš„å­æ ‘</li>\n</ul>\n</blockquote>\n<p>èŠ‚é€‰è‡ª <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A0%91_(%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%84)\">æ ‘(æ•°æ®ç»“æ„)</a></p>\n<h2 id=\"ding-yi-shu-ju-jie-gou\">å®šä¹‰æ•°æ®ç»“æ„</h2>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__init__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span children: èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ª TreeNode çš„åˆ—è¡¨\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span>\n</span><span> self.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>value\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>children:\n</span><span> self.children </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif not </span><span>self.value:\n</span><span> self.children </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>children\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">class </span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;color:#a6e22e;\">Tree</span><span>(</span><span
