/eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#dai-ma-5","title":"ä»£ç ","children":[]}]},{"level":2,"id":"dui-pai-xu","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#dui-pai-xu","title":"å †æ’åº","children":[{"level":3,"id":"yuan-li-6","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#yuan-li-6","title":"åŸç†","children":[]},{"level":3,"id":"bu-zou-6","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#bu-zou-6","title":"æ­¥éª¤","children":[]},{"level":3,"id":"dai-ma-6","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#dai-ma-6","title":"ä»£ç ","children":[]}]},{"level":2,"id":"ji-shu-pai-xu","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#ji-shu-pai-xu","title":"è®¡æ•°æ’åº","children":[{"level":3,"id":"yuan-li-7","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#yuan-li-7","title":"åŸç†","children":[]},{"level":3,"id":"bu-zou-7","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#bu-zou-7","title":"æ­¥éª¤","children":[]},{"level":3,"id":"dai-ma-7","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#dai-ma-7","title":"ä»£ç ","children":[]}]},{"level":2,"id":"di-jiu-chong-pai-xu","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#di-jiu-chong-pai-xu","title":"ç¬¬ä¹ç§æ’åº","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"can-kao-zi-liao","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#can-kao-zi-liao","title":"å‚è€ƒèµ„æ–™","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"gan-xie","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#gan-xie","title":"æ„Ÿè°¢","children":[]}],"word_count":3119,"reading_time":16,"assets":[],"draft":false,"lang":"cn","lower":{"relative_path":"posts/tree-in-python.cn.md","content":"<p>æ ‘æ˜¯è®¡ç®—æœºç§‘å­¦ä¸­å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¹‹ä¸€,å¸¸è§çš„åœ°æ–¹æœ‰ï¼ŒJava çš„ç»§æ‰¿æ ‘ç­‰ã€‚\nè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€äº›åŸºäºæ ‘çš„ç‰¹æ®Šæ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚äºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼ŒB æ ‘ï¼Œç­‰ç­‰ã€‚</p>\n<p>æœ¬ç¯‡ä¼šè®²è¿°ä¸€äº›å…³äºç®€å•å…³äºæ ‘çš„æ“ä½œã€‚</p>\n<span id=\"continue-reading\"></span><h2 id=\"shu-de-ding-yi\">æ ‘çš„å®šä¹‰</h2>\n<blockquote>\n<p>æ ‘ï¼ˆè‹±è¯­ï¼štreeï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ç§æŠ½è±¡æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼ˆADTï¼‰æˆ–æ˜¯å®ä½œè¿™ç§æŠ½è±¡æ•°æ®ç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œç”¨æ¥æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå…·æœ‰æ ‘çŠ¶ç»“æ„æ€§è´¨çš„æ•°æ®é›†åˆã€‚å®ƒæ˜¯ç”±nï¼ˆn&gt;0ï¼‰ä¸ªæœ‰é™èŠ‚ç‚¹ç»„æˆä¸€ä¸ªå…·æœ‰å±‚æ¬¡å…³ç³»çš„é›†åˆã€‚æŠŠå®ƒå«åšâ€œæ ‘â€æ˜¯å› ä¸ºå®ƒçœ‹èµ·æ¥åƒä¸€æ£µå€’æŒ‚çš„æ ‘ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´å®ƒæ˜¯æ ¹æœä¸Šï¼Œè€Œå¶æœä¸‹çš„ã€‚å®ƒå…·æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹çš„ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š</p>\n</blockquote>\n<blockquote>\n<ul>\n<li>æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æœ‰é›¶ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªå­èŠ‚ç‚¹</li>\n<li>æ²¡æœ‰çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ç§°ä¸ºæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹</li>\n<li>æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªéæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹æœ‰ä¸”åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹</li>\n<li>é™¤äº†æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤–ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºå¤šä¸ªä¸ç›¸äº¤çš„å­æ ‘</li>\n</ul>\n</blockquote>\n<p>èŠ‚é€‰è‡ª <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A0%91_(%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%84)\">æ ‘(æ•°æ®ç»“æ„)</a></p>\n<h2 id=\"ding-yi-shu-ju-jie-gou\">å®šä¹‰æ•°æ®ç»“æ„</h2>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">class </span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;color:#a6e22e;\">TreeNode</span><span>(</span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;font-style:italic;color:#a6e22e;\">object</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__init__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">value</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">children</span><span>: </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :param value: èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :param children: èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ª TreeNode çš„åˆ—è¡¨\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span>\n</span><span> self.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>value\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>children:\n</span><span> self.children </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif not </span><span>self.value:\n</span><span> self.children </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> self.children </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>children\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">class </span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;color:#a6e22e;\">Tree</span><span>(</span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;font-style:italic;color:#a6e22e;\">object</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘ï¼šåŸºæœ¬æ ‘çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__init__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>: TreeNode </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> ä¼ å…¥æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :param root: å¦‚æœä¸º TreeNode ä¸ºæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œ å¦‚æœä¸º None ä¸ºç©ºä¹¦\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>(root </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(root, TreeNode)):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">raise </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">AttributeError</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;illegal root&#39;</span><span>)\n</span><span> self.root </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>root\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qian-xu-bian-li\">å‰åºéå†</h2>\n<p>å…ˆéå†æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚åœ¨éå†å­©å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚\n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E5%89%8D%E5%BA%8F%E9%81%8D%E5%8E%86.jpg\" alt=\"å‰åºéå†\" /></p>\n<h3 id=\"xun-huan-ban\">å¾ªç¯ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">preorder_traversal_while</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„å‰åºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span> stack </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[self.root]\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack.pop()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children[::</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>]:\n</span><span> stack.append(sub_node)\n</span><span> res.append(node.value)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span></code></pre>\n<h3 id=\"di-gui-ban\">é€’å½’ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">preorder_traversal_recursion</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„å‰åºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>):\n</span><span> inner_res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>root.value:\n</span><span> inner_res.append(root.value)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> inner_res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span>_inner(sub_node)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>inner_res\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"hou-xu-bian-li\">ååºéå†</h2>\n<p>å…ˆéå†å­©å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæœ€åéå†æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚</p>\n<p><img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E5%90%8E%E5%BA%8F%E9%81%8D%E5%8E%86.jpg\" alt=\"ååºéå†\" /></p>\n<h3 id=\"xun-huan-ban-1\">å¾ªç¯ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">postorder_traversal_while</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„ååºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> stack </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[self.root]\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack.pop()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children:\n</span><span> stack.append(sub_node)\n</span><span> res.append(node.value)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res[::</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>]\n</span></code></pre>\n<h3 id=\"di-gui-ban-1\">é€’å½’ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">postorder_traversal_recursion</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„ååºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>):\n</span><span> inner_res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>root.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> inner_res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span>_inner(sub_node)\n</span><span> inner_res.append(root.value)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>inner_res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span><span>\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"ceng-ci-bian-li\">å±‚æ¬¡éå†</h2>\n<p>æŒ‰å±‚éå†èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚\n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E5%B1%82%E5%BA%8F%E9%81%8D%E5%8E%86.jpg\" alt=\"å±‚åºéå†\" /></p>\n<h3 id=\"xun-huan-ban-2\">å¾ªç¯ç‰ˆ</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">layer_while</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> æ ‘çš„å±‚åºéå†\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> :return: list of tree node value\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> &quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>self.root:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span><span>\n</span><span> queue </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>Queue()\n</span><span> queue.put(self.root)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span>queue.qsize():\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>queue.get()\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> res.append(node.value)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children:\n</span><span> queue.put(sub_node)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-shu-de-shen-du\">æ±‚æ ‘çš„æ·±åº¦</h2>\n<p>è®¡ç®—æ ‘çš„æœ€å¤§æ·±åº¦ã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">depth_recursion</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">depth</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>depth\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">max</span><span>([_inner(sub_node, depth</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children])\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-shu-de-jie-dian-shu\">æ±‚æ ‘çš„ç»“ç‚¹æ•°</h2>\n<p>è®¡ç®—æ ‘ä¸€å…±æœ‰å¤šå°‘èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">node_count</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">sum</span><span>([_inner(sub_node) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children])\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-shu-de-xie-zi-shu\">æ±‚æ ‘çš„å¶å­æ•°</h2>\n<p>è®¡ç®—ä¹¦ä¸­æœ‰å¤šå°‘æ²¡æœ‰å­©å­çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">leaf_count</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">_inner</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">root</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>root.children:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">sum</span><span>([_inner(sub_node) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>root.children])\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>_inner(self.root)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-liang-ge-jie-dian-de-zui-di-gong-gong-zu-xian-jie-dian\">æ±‚ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„æœ€ä½å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆç»“ç‚¹</h2>\n<p>é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦åœ¨æ ‘ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ã€‚\nä¿å­˜æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é“¾è¡¨ã€‚\néå†ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨çš„æœ€é•¿å…¬å…±èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå°±èƒ½æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€ä½çš„å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚\n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E6%9C%80%E4%BD%8E%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E7%A5%96%E5%85%88%E8%8A%82%E7%82%B9.jpg\" alt=\"æœ€ä½å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆèŠ‚ç‚¹\" /></p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">lowest_ancestor_node</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node1</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node2</span><span>):\n</span><span> stack </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[self.root]\n</span><span> stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> stack2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and not </span><span>(stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>stack2):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack.pop()\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span>node1:\n</span><span> stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack[:]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span>node2:\n</span><span> stack2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack[:]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children:\n</span><span> stack.append(sub_node)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>self.root\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack1)):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>stack1[i] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span>stack2[i]:\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack1[i]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res.value\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>res.value\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"qiu-ren-yi-liang-jie-dian-ju-chi\">æ±‚ä»»æ„ä¸¤ç»“ç‚¹è·ç¦»</h2>\n<p>é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦åœ¨æ ‘ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ã€‚\nä¿å­˜æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é“¾è¡¨ã€‚\nåœ¨åˆ¤æ–­å‰©ä½™çš„é•¿åº¦\n<img src=\"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/tree-in-python/media/15231560956719/%E4%BB%BB%E6%84%8F%E4%B8%A4%E8%8A%82%E7%82%B9%E8%B7%9D%E7%A6%BB.jpg\" alt=\"ä»»æ„ä¸¤èŠ‚ç‚¹è·ç¦»\" /></p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">two_node_distence</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node1</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node2</span><span>):\n</span><span> stack </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[self.root]\n</span><span> stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> stack2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and not </span><span>(stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>stack2):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack.pop()\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span>node1:\n</span><span> stack1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack[:]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is </span><span>node2:\n</span><span> stack2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack[:]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if not </span><span>node.value:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">continue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>sub_node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>node.children:\n</span><span> stack.append(sub_node)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>self.root\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack1)):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>stack1[i] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span>stack2[i]:\n</span><span> res </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack1[i]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack1) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack2) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">*</span><span>i\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack1) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(stack2) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">*</span><span>i\n</span><span>\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"zong-shu\">ç»¼è¿°</h2>\n<p>ä»¥ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯å’Œæ ‘æœ‰å…³è”çš„ç®€å•ä»£ç ã€‚\nä»¥ä¸Šä»£ç ä¹Ÿåœ¨ Github ä¸Šå‘å¸ƒ <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://github.com/EINDEX/Python-algorithm/blob/master/data_structure/tree/tree.py\">tree</a>ï¼Œ å¦‚æœ‰å·®é”™ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿æäº¤ Issue æˆ– PRã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"yuan-li\">åŸç†</h3>\n<p>å†’æ³¡æ’åº(Bubble Sort)æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç®€å•çš„æ’åºç®—æ³•ã€‚å®ƒé‡å¤åœ°èµ°è®¿è¿‡è¦æ’åºçš„æ•°åˆ—ï¼Œä¸€æ¬¡æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¦‚æœä»–ä»¬çš„é¡ºåºé”™è¯¯å°±æŠŠä»–ä»¬äº¤æ¢è¿‡æ¥ã€‚èµ°è®¿æ•°åˆ—çš„å·¥ä½œæ˜¯é‡å¤åœ°è¿›è¡Œç›´åˆ°æ²¡æœ‰å†éœ€è¦äº¤æ¢ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´è¯¥æ•°åˆ—å·²ç»æ’åºå®Œæˆã€‚è¿™ä¸ªç®—æ³•çš„åå­—ç”±æ¥æ˜¯å› ä¸ºè¶Šå°çš„å…ƒç´ ä¼šç»ç”±äº¤æ¢æ…¢æ…¢â€œæµ®â€åˆ°æ•°åˆ—çš„é¡¶ç«¯ã€‚</p>\n<h3 Sortï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç®€å•ç›´è§‚çš„æ’åºç®—æ³•ã€‚å®ƒçš„å·¥ä½œåŸç†æ˜¯é€šè¿‡æ„å»ºæœ‰åºåºåˆ—ï¼Œå¯¹äºæœªæ’åºæ•°æ®ï¼Œåœ¨å·²æ’åºåºåˆ—ä¸­ä»åå‘å‰æ‰«æï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°ç›¸åº”ä½ç½®å¹¶æ’å…¥ã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"bu-zou-2\">æ­¥éª¤</h3>\n<ol>\n<li>ä»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹ï¼Œè¯¥å…ƒç´ å¯ä»¥è®¤ä¸ºå·²ç»è¢«æ’åº</li>\n<li>å–å‡ºä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œåœ¨å·²ç»æ’åºçš„å…ƒç´ åºåˆ—ä¸­ä»åå‘å‰æ‰«æ</li>\n<li>å¦‚æœè¯¥å…ƒç´ ï¼ˆå·²æ’åºï¼‰å¤§äºæ–°å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå°†è¯¥å…ƒç´ ç§»åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä½ç½®</li>\n<li>é‡å¤æ­¥éª¤3ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰¾åˆ°å·²æ’åºçš„å…ƒç´ å°äºæˆ–è€…ç­‰äºæ–°å…ƒç´ çš„ä½ç½®</li>\n<li>å°†æ–°å…ƒç´ æ’å…¥åˆ°è¯¥ä½ç½®å</li>\n<li>é‡å¤æ­¥éª¤2~5</li>\n</ol>\n<h3 ä»åå¾€å‰ä¾æ¬¡æ¯”è¾ƒæ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ \n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>j </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span å’Œæ¯”å–å‡ºå…ƒç´ å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ äº¤æ¢\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[j] </span><span id=\"xi-er-pai-xu\">å¸Œå°”æ’åº</h2>\n<h3 id=\"yuan-li-3\">åŸç†</h3>\n<p>å¸Œå°”æ’åºï¼Œä¹Ÿç§°é€’å‡å¢é‡æ’åºç®—æ³•ï¼Œæ˜¯æ’å…¥æ’åºçš„ä¸€ç§æ›´é«˜æ•ˆçš„æ”¹è¿›ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚å¸Œå°”æ’åºæ˜¯éç¨³å®šæ’åºç®—æ³•ã€‚\nå¸Œå°”æ’åºæ˜¯åŸºäºæ’å…¥æ’åºçš„ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸¤ç‚¹æ€§è´¨è€Œæå‡ºæ”¹è¿›æ–¹æ³•çš„ï¼š\næ’å…¥æ’åºåœ¨å¯¹å‡ ä¹å·²ç»æ’å¥½åºçš„æ•°æ®æ“ä½œæ—¶ï¼Œæ•ˆç‡é«˜ï¼Œå³å¯ä»¥è¾¾åˆ°çº¿æ€§æ’åºçš„æ•ˆç‡\nä½†æ’å…¥æ’åºä¸€èˆ¬æ¥è¯´æ˜¯ä½æ•ˆçš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ’å…¥æ’åºæ¯æ¬¡åªèƒ½å°†æ•°æ®ç§»åŠ¨ä¸€ä½ã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"bu-zou-3\">æ­¥éª¤</h3>\n<p>æ¯æ¬¡ä»¥ä¸€å®šæ­¥é•¿(å°±æ˜¯è·³è¿‡ç­‰è·çš„æ•°)è¿›è¡Œæ’åºï¼Œç›´è‡³æ­¥é•¿ä¸º1.</p>\n<h3 id=\"dai-ma-3\">ä»£ç </h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" gap </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">round</span><span>(n </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">/ </span><span </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[i]\n</span><span> j </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>i\n</span><span> </span><span 109,...)ï¼Œè¯¥åºåˆ—çš„é¡¹æ¥è‡ª {\\displaystyle 9\\times 4^{i}-9\\times 2^{i}+1} 9\\times 4^{i}-9\\times 2^{i}+1å’Œ {\\displaystyle 2^{i+2}\\times (2^{i+2}-3)+1} 2^{{i+2}}\\times (2^{{i+2}}-3)+1è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªç®—å¼ã€‚\nä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨<a rel=\"nofollow\" id=\"gui-bing-pai-xu\">å½’å¹¶æ’åº</h2>\n<h3 id=\"yuan-li-4\">åŸç†</h3>\n<p>å½’å¹¶æ“ä½œ(å½’å¹¶ç®—æ³•)ï¼ŒæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªå·²ç»æ’åºçš„åºåˆ—åˆå¹¶æˆä¸€ä¸ªåºåˆ—çš„æ“ä½œã€‚å½’å¹¶æ’åºç®—æ³•ä¾èµ–å½’å¹¶æ“ä½œã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"bu-zou-4\">æ­¥éª¤</h3>\n<h4 id=\"die-dai-fa\">è¿­ä»£æ³•</h4>\n<ol>\n<li>ç”³è¯·ç©ºé—´ï¼Œä½¿å…¶å¤§å°ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªå·²ç»æ’åºåºåˆ—ä¹‹å’Œï¼Œè¯¥ç©ºé—´ç”¨æ¥å­˜æ”¾åˆå¹¶åçš„åºåˆ—</li>\n<li>è®¾å®šä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œæœ€åˆä½ç½®åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªå·²ç»æ’åºåºåˆ—çš„èµ·å§‹ä½ç½®</li>\n<li>æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆæ‰€æŒ‡å‘çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©ç›¸å¯¹å°çš„å…ƒç´ æ”¾å…¥åˆ°åˆå¹¶ç©ºé—´ï¼Œå¹¶ç§»åŠ¨æŒ‡é’ˆåˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä½ç½®</li>\n<li>é‡å¤æ­¥éª¤3ç›´åˆ°æŸä¸€æŒ‡é’ˆåˆ°è¾¾åºåˆ—å°¾</li>\n<li>å°†å¦ä¸€åºåˆ—å‰©ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ ç›´æ¥å¤åˆ¶åˆ°åˆå¹¶åºåˆ—å°¾</li>\n</ol>\n<h4 id=\"di-gui-fa\">é€’å½’æ³•</h4>\n<p>å‡è®¾åºåˆ—å…±æœ‰nä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼š</p>\n<ol>\n<li>å°†åºåˆ—æ¯ç›¸é‚»ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°å­—è¿›è¡Œå½’å¹¶æ“ä½œï¼Œå½¢æˆ {\\displaystyle floor(n/2)} floor(n/2)ä¸ªåºåˆ—ï¼Œæ’åºåæ¯ä¸ªåºåˆ—åŒ…å«ä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç´ </li>\n<li>å°†ä¸Šè¿°åºåˆ—å†æ¬¡å½’å¹¶ï¼Œå½¢æˆ {\\displaystyle floor(n/4)} floor(n/4)ä¸ªåºåˆ—ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªåºåˆ—åŒ…å«å››ä¸ªå…ƒç´ </li>\n<li>é‡å¤æ­¥éª¤2ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ æ’åºå®Œæ¯•</li>\n</ol>\n<h3 id=\"dai-ma-4\">ä»£ç </h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># é€’å½’æ³•\n</span><span </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># è®¤ä¸ºé•¿åº¦ä¸å¤§äº1çš„æ•°åˆ—æ˜¯æœ‰åºçš„\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">// </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2\n</span><span> left </span><span </span><span>merge_sort(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[middle:])\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡åˆå¹¶\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>merge(left, right)\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># åˆå¹¶\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt;</span><span>right[r]:\n</span><span> result.append(left[l])\n</span><span> l</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> result.append(right[r])\n</span><span> r </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+=</span><span \n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>result\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>é„™äººä¸æ‰ï¼Œä¸çŸ¥å½’å¹¶æ’åºçš„è¿­ä»£æ³•å¦‚ä½•ç”¨Pythonå®ç°ï¼Œæœ›æŒ‡æ•™ã€‚</p>\n<h2 conquerï¼‰ç­–ç•¥æ¥æŠŠä¸€ä¸ªåºåˆ—ï¼ˆlistï¼‰åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªå­åºåˆ—ï¼ˆsub-listsï¼‰ã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"bu-zou-5\">æ­¥éª¤</h3>\n<ol>\n<li>ä»æ•°åˆ—ä¸­æŒ‘å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œç§°ä¸º&quot;åŸºå‡†&quot;ï¼ˆpivotï¼‰ï¼Œ</li>\n<li>é‡æ–°æ’åºæ•°åˆ—ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ æ¯”åŸºå‡†å€¼å°çš„æ‘†æ”¾åœ¨åŸºå‡†å‰é¢ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ æ¯”åŸºå‡†å€¼å¤§çš„æ‘†åœ¨åŸºå‡†çš„åé¢ï¼ˆç›¸åŒçš„æ•°å¯ä»¥åˆ°ä»»ä¸€è¾¹ï¼‰ã€‚åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªåˆ†åŒºç»“æŸä¹‹åï¼Œè¯¥åŸºå‡†å°±å¤„äºæ•°åˆ—çš„ä¸­é—´ä½ç½®ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªç§°ä¸ºåˆ†åŒºï¼ˆpartitionï¼‰æ“ä½œã€‚</li>\n<li>é€’å½’åœ°ï¼ˆrecursiveï¼‰æŠŠå°äºåŸºå‡†å€¼å…ƒç´ çš„å­æ•°åˆ—å’Œå¤§äºåŸºå‡†å€¼å…ƒç´ çš„å­æ•°åˆ—æ’åºã€‚</li>\n</ol>\n<h3 id=\"dai-ma-5\">ä»£ç </h3>\n<p>æ™®é€šç‰ˆ</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> more </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># é€’å½’å‡ºå£\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>) </span><span å°†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼åšä¸ºåŸºå‡†\n</span><span> pivot </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å°†æ¯”æ€¥è½¬å°çš„å€¼æ”¾åˆ°lessæ•°åˆ—\n</span><span> </span><span å°†æ¯”åŸºå‡†æ‰“çš„å€¼æ”¾åˆ°moreæ•°åˆ—\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">elif </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt; </span><span>pivot:\n</span><span> more.append(i)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å°†å’ŒåŸºå‡†ç›¸åŒçš„å€¼ä¿å­˜åœ¨åŸºå‡†æ•°åˆ—\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> pivotList.append(i)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å¯¹lessæ•°åˆ—å’Œmoreæ•°åˆ—ç»§ç»­è¿›è¡Œæ’åº\n</span><span> less </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>quick_sort(less)\n</span><span> more </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>quick_sort(more)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>less </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span>pivotList </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span>more\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>å’³å’³ï¼Œä¸‹é¢è¿™æ®µä»£ç å‡ºè‡ªã€ŠPython cookbook ç¬¬äºŒç‰ˆã€‹ä¼ è¯´ä¸­çš„ä¸‰è¡Œå®ç°pythonå¿«é€Ÿæ’åºã€‚</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">qsort</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt;= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>arr\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> pivot </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>arr[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>]\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>qsort([x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>arr[</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span>\\\n</span><span> [pivot] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span>\\\n</span><span> qsort([x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>arr[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>:] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>x </span><span class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span>qs </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">lambda </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">xs </span><span>: ( (</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(xs) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt;= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>[xs]) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">or </span><span>[ qs( [x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span>xs[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>:] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>x </span><span </span><span>xs[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>:] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt;= </span><span>xs[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>]] ) ] )[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>]\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æ„Ÿå—åˆ°äº†Pythonçš„é­…åŠ›ï¼Ÿ</p>\n<h2 id=\"dui-pai-xu\">å †æ’åº</h2>\n<h3 id=\"yuan-li-6\">åŸç†</h3>\n<p>å †æ’åºï¼ˆHeapsortï¼‰æ˜¯æŒ‡åˆ©ç”¨å †è¿™ç§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„æ‰€è®¾è®¡çš„ä¸€ç§æ’åºç®—æ³•ã€‚å †ç§¯æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¿‘ä¼¼å®Œå…¨äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„ç»“æ„ï¼Œå¹¶åŒæ—¶æ»¡è¶³å †ç§¯çš„æ€§è´¨ï¼šå³å­ç»“ç‚¹çš„é”®å€¼æˆ–ç´¢å¼•æ€»æ˜¯å°äºï¼ˆæˆ–è€…å¤§äºï¼‰å®ƒçš„çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"bu-zou-6\">æ­¥éª¤</h3>\n<ol>\n<li>åˆ›å»ºæœ€å¤§å †:å°†å †æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®é‡æ–°æ’åºï¼Œä½¿å…¶æˆä¸ºæœ€å¤§å †</li>\n<li>æœ€å¤§å †è°ƒæ•´:ä½œç”¨æ˜¯ä¿æŒæœ€å¤§å †çš„æ€§è´¨ï¼Œæ˜¯åˆ›å»ºæœ€å¤§å †çš„æ ¸å¿ƒå­ç¨‹åº</li>\n<li>å †æ’åº:ç§»é™¤ä½åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®çš„æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¹¶åšæœ€å¤§å †è°ƒæ•´çš„é€’å½’è¿ç®—</li>\n</ol>\n<h3 id=\"dai-ma-6\">ä»£ç </h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">heap_sort</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">list</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># åˆ›å»ºæœ€å¤§å †\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>start </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>((</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">// </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>):\n</span><span> sift_down(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>, start, </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>)\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å †æ’åº\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>end </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">len</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>) </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">-</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>], </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[end] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[end], </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>]\n</span><span> sift_down(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>, </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>, end </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># æœ€å¤§å †è°ƒæ•´\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">sift_down</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">lst</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">start</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">end</span><span>):\n</span><span> root </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>start\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">True</span><span>:\n</span><span> child </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">* </span><span>root </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>child </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt; </span><span>end:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">break\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>child </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1 </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt;= </span><span>end </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">and </span><span>lst[child] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt; </span><span>lst[child </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>]:\n</span><span> child </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>lst[root] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt; </span><span>lst[child]:\n</span><span> lst[root], lst[child] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>lst[child], lst[root]\n</span><span> root </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>child\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">break\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"ji-shu-pai-xu\">è®¡æ•°æ’åº</h2>\n<h3 id=\"yuan-li-7\">åŸç†</h3>\n<p>å½“è¾“å…¥çš„å…ƒç´ æ˜¯nä¸ª0åˆ°kä¹‹é—´çš„æ•´æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œå®ƒçš„è¿è¡Œæ—¶é—´æ˜¯Î˜(n + k)ã€‚è®¡æ•°æ’åºä¸æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒæ’åºï¼Œæ’åºçš„é€Ÿåº¦å¿«äºä»»ä½•æ¯”è¾ƒæ’åºç®—æ³•ã€‚</p>\n<p>ç”±äºç”¨æ¥è®¡æ•°çš„æ•°ç»„Cçš„é•¿åº¦å–å†³äºå¾…æ’åºæ•°ç»„ä¸­æ•°æ®çš„èŒƒå›´ï¼ˆç­‰äºå¾…æ’åºæ•°ç»„çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ä¸æœ€å°å€¼çš„å·®åŠ ä¸Š1ï¼‰ï¼Œè¿™ä½¿å¾—è®¡æ•°æ’åºå¯¹äºæ•°æ®èŒƒå›´å¾ˆå¤§çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œéœ€è¦å¤§é‡æ—¶é—´å’Œå†…å­˜ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šè®¡æ•°æ’åºæ˜¯ç”¨æ¥æ’åº0åˆ°100ä¹‹é—´çš„æ•°å­—çš„æœ€å¥½çš„ç®—æ³•ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å®ƒä¸é€‚åˆæŒ‰å­—æ¯é¡ºåºæ’åºäººåã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œè®¡æ•°æ’åºå¯ä»¥ç”¨åœ¨åŸºæ•°æ’åºç®—æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿæ›´æœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ’åºæ•°æ®èŒƒå›´å¾ˆå¤§çš„æ•°ç»„ã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"bu-zou-7\">æ­¥éª¤</h3>\n<ol>\n<li>æ‰¾å‡ºå¾…æ’åºçš„æ•°ç»„ä¸­æœ€å¤§å’Œæœ€å°çš„å…ƒç´ </li>\n<li>ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ¯ä¸ªå€¼ä¸ºiçš„å…ƒç´ å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œå­˜å…¥æ•°ç»„ C çš„ç¬¬ i é¡¹</li>\n<li>å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰çš„è®¡æ•°ç´¯åŠ ï¼ˆä»Cä¸­çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€é¡¹å’Œå‰ä¸€é¡¹ç›¸åŠ ï¼‰</li>\n<li>åå‘å¡«å……ç›®æ ‡æ•°ç»„ï¼šå°†æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ iæ”¾åœ¨æ–°æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬C(i)é¡¹ï¼Œæ¯æ”¾ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å°±å°†C(i)å‡å»1</li>\n</ol>\n<h3 id=\"dai-ma-7\">ä»£ç </h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">count_sort</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">list</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">min </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">2147483647\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">max </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å–å¾—æœ€å¤§å€¼å’Œæœ€å°å€¼\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt; </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">min</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">min </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>x\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>x </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&gt; </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">max</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">max </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>x\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># åˆ›å»ºæ•°ç»„C\n</span><span> count </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>[</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0</span><span>] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">* </span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">max </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">min </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>index </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>:\n</span><span> count[index </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">min</span><span>] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> index </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å¡«å€¼\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>a </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">max </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">- </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">min</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">for </span><span>c </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">in </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">range</span><span>(count[a]):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>[index] </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>a </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+ </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">min\n</span><span> index </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"di-jiu-chong-pai-xu\">ç¬¬ä¹ç§æ’åº</h2>\n<p>Noneï¼Ÿ\nå½“ç„¶ä¸ä¼š\nè‡ªç„¶å°±æ˜¯ç³»ç»Ÿè‡ªå¸¦çš„</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">list</span><span>.sort()\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>ä»¥ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰æºä»£ç å‡åœ¨<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://github.com/EINDEX/Python-algorithm\">Githubå…±äº«</a>å¸Œæœ›ä¸å¤§å®¶å…±åŒè¿›æ­¥!</p>\n<hr />\n<h2 id=\"can-kao-zi-liao\">å‚è€ƒèµ„æ–™</h2>\n<ul>\n<li>ç»´åŸºç™¾ç§‘: <a rel=\"nofollow\" /eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#dai-ma-5","title":"ä»£ç ","children":[]}]},{"level":2,"id":"dui-pai-xu","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#dui-pai-xu","title":"å †æ’åº","children":[{"level":3,"id":"yuan-li-6","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#yuan-li-6","title":"åŸç†","children":[]},{"level":3,"id":"bu-zou-6","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#bu-zou-6","title":"æ­¥éª¤","children":[]},{"level":3,"id":"dai-ma-6","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#dai-ma-6","title":"ä»£ç ","children":[]}]},{"level":2,"id":"ji-shu-pai-xu","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#ji-shu-pai-xu","title":"è®¡æ•°æ’åº","children":[{"level":3,"id":"yuan-li-7","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#yuan-li-7","title":"åŸç†","children":[]},{"level":3,"id":"bu-zou-7","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#bu-zou-7","title":"æ­¥éª¤","children":[]},{"level":3,"id":"dai-ma-7","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#dai-ma-7","title":"ä»£ç ","children":[]}]},{"level":2,"id":"di-jiu-chong-pai-xu","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#di-jiu-chong-pai-xu","title":"ç¬¬ä¹ç§æ’åº","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"can-kao-zi-liao","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#can-kao-zi-liao","title":"å‚è€ƒèµ„æ–™","children":[]},{"level":2,"id":"gan-xie","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/#gan-xie","title":"æ„Ÿè°¢","children":[]}],"word_count":3119,"reading_time":16,"assets":[],"draft":false,"lang":"cn","lower":null,"higher":null,"translations":[{"lang":"cn","permalink":"https://eindex.me/cn/posts/sort-in-python/","title":"åŸºæœ¬æ’åºç®—æ³•çš„Pythonå®ç°","path":"/home/runner/work/blog/blog/content/posts/sort-in-python.cn.md"}],"backlinks":[]},"higher":{"relative_path":"posts/liner-in-python.cn.md","content":"<p>æœ¬ç¯‡ä¸»è¦å®ç°å››ç§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯æ•°ç»„ã€å †æ ˆã€é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€é“¾è¡¨ã€‚æˆ‘ä¸çŸ¥é“æˆ‘ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦ç”¨Pythonæ¥å¹²Cå¹²çš„äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œæ€»ä¹‹Pythonå°±æ˜¯å¯ä»¥å¹²ã€‚</p>\n<span id=\"continue-reading\"></span>\n<p><strong>æ‰€æœ‰æ¦‚å¿µæ€§å†…å®¹å¯ä»¥åœ¨å‚è€ƒèµ„æ–™ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°å‡ºå¤„</strong></p>\n<h2 id=\"shu-zu\">æ•°ç»„</h2>\n<h3 id=\"shu-zu-de-she-ji\">æ•°ç»„çš„è®¾è®¡</h3>\n<p>æ•°ç»„è®¾è®¡ä¹‹åˆæ˜¯åœ¨å½¢å¼ä¸Šä¾èµ–å†…å­˜åˆ†é…è€Œæˆçš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¿…é¡»åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨å‰é¢„å…ˆè¯·æ±‚ç©ºé—´ã€‚è¿™ä½¿å¾—æ•°ç»„æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹ç‰¹æ€§ï¼š</p>\n<ol>\n<li>è¯·æ±‚ç©ºé—´ä»¥åå¤§å°å›ºå®šï¼Œä¸èƒ½å†æ”¹å˜ï¼ˆæ•°æ®æº¢å‡ºé—®é¢˜ï¼‰ï¼›</li>\n<li>åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­æœ‰ç©ºé—´è¿ç»­æ€§çš„è¡¨ç°ï¼Œä¸­é—´ä¸ä¼šå­˜åœ¨å…¶ä»–ç¨‹åºéœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¸ºæ­¤æ•°ç»„çš„ä¸“ç”¨å†…å­˜ç©ºé—´ï¼›</li>\n<li>åœ¨æ—§å¼ç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€ä¸­ï¼ˆå¦‚æœ‰ä¸­é˜¶è¯­è¨€ä¹‹ç§°çš„Cï¼‰ï¼Œç¨‹åºä¸ä¼šå¯¹æ•°ç»„çš„æ“ä½œåšä¸‹ç•Œåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æœ‰æ½œåœ¨çš„è¶Šç•Œæ“ä½œçš„é£é™©ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚ä¼šæŠŠæ•°æ®å†™åœ¨è¿è¡Œä¸­ç¨‹åºéœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ ¸å¿ƒéƒ¨åˆ†çš„å†…å­˜ä¸Šï¼‰ã€‚</li>\n</ol>\n<p>å› ä¸ºç®€å•æ•°ç»„å¼ºçƒˆå€šèµ–ç”µè„‘ç¡¬ä»¶ä¹‹å†…å­˜ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸é€‚ç”¨äºç°ä»£çš„ç¨‹åºè®¾è®¡ã€‚æ¬²ä½¿ç”¨å¯å˜å¤§å°ã€ç¡¬ä»¶æ— å…³æ€§çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼ŒJavaç­‰ç¨‹åºè®¾è®¡è¯­è¨€å‡æä¾›äº†æ›´é«˜çº§çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼šArrayListã€Vectorç­‰åŠ¨æ€æ•°ç»„ã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"pythonde-shu-zu\">Pythonçš„æ•°ç»„</h3>\n<p>ä»ä¸¥æ ¼æ„ä¹‰ä¸Šæ¥è¯´:Pythoné‡Œæ²¡æœ‰ä¸¥æ ¼æ„ä¹‰ä¸Šçš„æ•°ç»„ã€‚\n<code>List</code>å¯ä»¥è¯´æ˜¯Pythoné‡Œçš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä¸‹é¢è¿™æ®µä»£ç æ˜¯CPythonçš„å®ç°<code>List</code>çš„ç»“æ„ä½“:</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"c\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-c \"><code class=\"language-c\" data-lang=\"c\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">typedef struct </span><span>{\n</span><span> PyObject_VAR_HEAD\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">/* Vector of pointers to list elements. list[0] is ob_item[0], etc. */\n</span><span> PyObject </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">**</span><span>ob_item;\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">/* ob_item contains space for &#39;allocated&#39; elements. The number\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> * currently in use is ob_size.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> * Invariants:\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> * 0 &lt;= ob_size &lt;= allocated\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> * len(list) == ob_size\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> * ob_item == NULL implies ob_size == allocated == 0\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> * list.sort() temporarily sets allocated to -1 to detect mutations.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> *\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> * Items must normally not be NULL, except during construction when\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> * the list is not yet visible outside the function that builds it.\n</span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"> */\n</span><span> Py_ssize_t allocated;\n</span><span>} PyListObject;\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>å–è‡ª<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://github.com/python/cpython/blob/f24143b25e4f83368ff6182bebe14f885073015c/Include/listobject.h\">CPython-Github</a></p>\n<p>è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡ç« è®²<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http://www.laurentluce.com/posts/python-list-implementation/\"><code>List</code>å®ç°</a>,æ„Ÿå…´è¶£çš„æœ‹å‹å¯ä»¥å»çœ‹çœ‹ã€‚<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http://python.jobbole.com/82549/\">ä¸­æ–‡ç‰ˆ</a>ã€‚</p>\n<p>å½“ç„¶ï¼Œåœ¨Pythoné‡Œå®ƒå°±æ˜¯æ•°ç»„ã€‚\nåé¢çš„ä¸€äº›ç»“æ„ä¹Ÿå°†ç”¨<code>List</code>æ¥å®ç°ã€‚</p>\n<h2 id=\"dui-zhan\">å †æ ˆ</h2>\n<h3 id=\"shi-yao-shi-dui-zhan\">ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯å †æ ˆ</h3>\n<p>å †æ ˆï¼ˆè‹±è¯­ï¼šstackï¼‰ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ç›´æ¥ç§°æ ˆï¼Œåœ¨è®¡ç®—æœºç§‘å­¦ä¸­ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç‰¹æ®Šçš„ä¸²åˆ—å½¢å¼çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œå®ƒçš„ç‰¹æ®Šä¹‹å¤„åœ¨äºåªèƒ½å…è®¸åœ¨é“¾æ¥ä¸²åˆ—æˆ–é˜µåˆ—çš„ä¸€ç«¯ï¼ˆç§°ä¸ºå †å é¡¶ç«¯æŒ‡æ ‡ï¼Œè‹±è¯­ï¼štopï¼‰è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å…¥èµ„æ–™ï¼ˆè‹±è¯­ï¼špushï¼‰å’Œè¾“å‡ºèµ„æ–™ï¼ˆè‹±è¯­ï¼špopï¼‰çš„è¿ç®—ã€‚å¦å¤–å †å ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç”¨ä¸€ç»´é˜µåˆ—æˆ–è¿ç»“ä¸²åˆ—çš„å½¢å¼æ¥å®Œæˆã€‚å †å çš„å¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªç›¸å¯¹çš„æ“ä½œæ–¹å¼ç§°ä¸ºä¼«åˆ—ã€‚</p>\n<p>ç”±äºå †å æ•°æ®ç»“æ„åªå…è®¸åœ¨ä¸€ç«¯è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œï¼Œå› è€ŒæŒ‰ç…§åè¿›å…ˆå‡ºï¼ˆLIFO, Last In First Outï¼‰çš„åŸç†è¿ä½œã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"te-dian\">ç‰¹ç‚¹</h3>\n<ul>\n<li>å…ˆå…¥åå‡ºï¼Œåå…¥å…ˆå‡ºã€‚</li>\n<li>é™¤å¤´å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¹‹å¤–ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå‰é©±ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªåç»§ã€‚</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"cao-zuo\">æ“ä½œ</h3>\n<p>ä»åŸç†å¯çŸ¥ï¼Œå¯¹å †æ ˆ(æ ˆ)å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œçš„æ“ä½œæœ‰:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>top():è·å–å †æ ˆé¡¶ç«¯å¯¹è±¡</li>\n<li>push():å‘æ ˆé‡Œæ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡</li>\n<li>pop():ä»æ ˆé‡Œæ¨å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"shi-xian\">å®ç°</h3>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">class </span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;color:#a6e22e;\">my_stack</span><span>(</span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;font-style:italic;color:#a6e22e;\">object</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__init__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">value</span><span>):\n</span><span> self.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>value\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å‰é©±\n</span><span> self.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># åç»§\n</span><span> self.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__str__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">str</span><span>(self.value)\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">top</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">stack</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(stack, my_stack):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>stack.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>top(stack.behind)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>stack\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">push</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">stack</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">ele</span><span>):\n</span><span> push_ele </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>my_stack(ele)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(stack, my_stack):\n</span><span> stack_top </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>top(stack)\n</span><span> push_ele.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>stack_top\n</span><span> push_ele.before.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>push_ele\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">raise </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">Exception</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;ä¸è¦ä¹±æ‰”ä¸œè¥¿è¿›æ¥å¥½ä¹ˆ&#39;</span><span>)\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">pop</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">stack</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(stack, my_stack):\n</span><span> stack_top </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>top(stack)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>stack_top.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> stack_top.before.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> stack_top.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>stack_top\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">print</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;å·²ç»æ˜¯æ ˆé¡¶äº†&#39;</span><span>)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"dui-lie\">é˜Ÿåˆ—</h2>\n<h3 id=\"shi-yao-shi-dui-lie\">ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯é˜Ÿåˆ—</h3>\n<p>å’Œå †æ ˆç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œå”¯ä¸€çš„åŒºåˆ«æ˜¯é˜Ÿåˆ—åªèƒ½åœ¨é˜Ÿå¤´è¿›è¡Œå‡ºé˜Ÿæ“ä½œï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯æ˜¯å…ˆè¿›å…ˆå‡ºï¼ˆFIFO, First-In-First-Outï¼‰çš„çº¿æ€§è¡¨</p>\n<h3 id=\"te-dian-1\">ç‰¹ç‚¹</h3>\n<ul>\n<li>å…ˆå…¥å…ˆå‡º,åå…¥åå‡º</li>\n<li>é™¤å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤–,æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªåç»§</li>\n<li>ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰é™¤å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤–,æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå‰é©±</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"cao-zuo-1\">æ“ä½œ</h3>\n<ul>\n<li>pushï¼ˆï¼‰:å…¥é˜Ÿ</li>\n<li>popï¼ˆï¼‰ï¼šå‡ºé˜Ÿ</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"shi-xian-1\">å®ç°</h3>\n<h4 id=\"pu-tong-dui-lie\">æ™®é€šé˜Ÿåˆ—</h4>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">class </span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;color:#a6e22e;\">MyQueue</span><span>():\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__init__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">value</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>):\n</span><span> self.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>value\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å‰é©±\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># self.before = None\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># åç»§\n</span><span> self.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__str__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">str</span><span>(self.value)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;None&#39;\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">create_queue</span><span>():\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\">&quot;&quot;&quot;ä»…æœ‰é˜Ÿå¤´&quot;&quot;&quot;\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>MyQueue()\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">last</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">queue</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(queue, MyQueue):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>queue.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>last(queue.behind)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>queue\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">push</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">queue</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">ele</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(queue, MyQueue):\n</span><span> last_queue </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>last(queue)\n</span><span> new_queue </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>MyQueue(ele)\n</span><span> last_queue.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>new_queue\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">pop</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">queue</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>queue.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> get_queue </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>queue.behind\n</span><span> queue.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>queue.behind.behind\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>get_queue\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">print</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;é˜Ÿåˆ—é‡Œå·²ç»æ²¡æœ‰å…ƒç´ äº†&#39;</span><span>)\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">print_queue</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">queue</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">print</span><span>(queue)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>queue.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> print_queue(queue.behind)\n</span></code></pre>\n<h2 id=\"lian-biao\">é“¾è¡¨</h2>\n<h3 id=\"shi-yao-shi-lian-biao\">ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯é“¾è¡¨</h3>\n<p>é“¾è¡¨ï¼ˆLinked listï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¸¸è§çš„åŸºç¡€æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç§çº¿æ€§è¡¨ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¹¶ä¸ä¼šæŒ‰çº¿æ€§çš„é¡ºåºå­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯åœ¨æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹é‡Œå­˜åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆ(Pointer)ã€‚ç”±äºä¸å¿…é¡»æŒ‰é¡ºåºå­˜å‚¨ï¼Œé“¾è¡¨åœ¨æ’å…¥çš„æ—¶å€™å¯ä»¥è¾¾åˆ°O(1)çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œæ¯”å¦ä¸€ç§çº¿æ€§è¡¨é¡ºåºè¡¨å¿«å¾—å¤šï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æŸ¥æ‰¾ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æˆ–è€…è®¿é—®ç‰¹å®šç¼–å·çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ™éœ€è¦O(n)çš„æ—¶é—´ï¼Œè€Œé¡ºåºè¡¨ç›¸åº”çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯O(logn)å’ŒO(1)ã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"te-dian-2\">ç‰¹ç‚¹</h3>\n<p>ä½¿ç”¨é“¾è¡¨ç»“æ„å¯ä»¥å…‹æœæ•°ç»„é“¾è¡¨éœ€è¦é¢„å…ˆçŸ¥é“æ•°æ®å¤§å°çš„ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼Œé“¾è¡¨ç»“æ„å¯ä»¥å……åˆ†åˆ©ç”¨è®¡ç®—æœºå†…å­˜ç©ºé—´ï¼Œå®ç°çµæ´»çš„å†…å­˜åŠ¨æ€ç®¡ç†ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯é“¾è¡¨å¤±å»äº†æ•°ç»„éšæœºè¯»å–çš„ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶é“¾è¡¨ç”±äºå¢åŠ äº†ç»“ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆåŸŸï¼Œç©ºé—´å¼€é”€æ¯”è¾ƒå¤§ã€‚</p>\n<h3 id=\"cao-zuo-2\">æ“ä½œ</h3>\n<ul>\n<li>init():åˆå§‹åŒ–</li>\n<li>insert(): æ’å…¥</li>\n<li>trave(): éå†</li>\n<li>delete(): åˆ é™¤</li>\n<li>find(): æŸ¥æ‰¾</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"shi-xian-2\">å®ç°</h3>\n<p>æ­¤å¤„ä»…å®ç°åŒå‘åˆ—è¡¨</p>\n<pre data-lang=\"python\" style=\"background-color:#272822;color:#f8f8f2;\" class=\"language-python \"><code class=\"language-python\" data-lang=\"python\"><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">class </span><span style=\"text-decoration:underline;color:#a6e22e;\">LinkedList</span><span>():\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__init__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">value</span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">=</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>):\n</span><span> self.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>value\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># å‰é©±\n</span><span> self.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#75715e;\"># åç»§\n</span><span> self.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">__str__</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">self</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>self.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">str</span><span>(self.value)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;None&#39;\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">init</span><span>():\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>LinkedList(</span><span style=\"color:#e6db74;\">&#39;HEAD&#39;</span><span>)\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">delete</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">linked_list</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(linked_list, LinkedList):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> delete(linked_list.behind)\n</span><span> linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> linked_list.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> linked_list.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">insert</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">linked_list</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">index</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">node</span><span>):\n</span><span> node </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>LinkedList(node)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(linked_list, LinkedList):\n</span><span> i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span>linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span>index:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">break\n</span><span> i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> linked_list </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>linked_list.behind\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> node.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>linked_list.behind\n</span><span> linked_list.behind.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>node\n</span><span> node.before, linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>linked_list, node\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">remove</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">linked_list</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">index</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(linked_list, LinkedList):\n</span><span> i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span>linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span>index:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">break\n</span><span> i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> linked_list </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>linked_list.behind\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> linked_list.behind.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>linked_list.before\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>linked_list.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> linked_list.before.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>linked_list.behind\n</span><span> linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> linked_list.before </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span> linked_list.value </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">trave</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">linked_list</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(linked_list, LinkedList):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">print</span><span>(linked_list)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> trave(linked_list.behind)\n</span><span>\n</span><span>\n</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#f92672;\">def </span><span style=\"color:#a6e22e;\">find</span><span>(</span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">linked_list</span><span>, </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#fd971f;\">index</span><span>):\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span style=\"color:#66d9ef;\">isinstance</span><span>(linked_list, LinkedList):\n</span><span> i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">0\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">while </span><span>linked_list.behind </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">is not </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">None</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">== </span><span>index:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>linked_list\n</span><span> i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">+= </span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">1\n</span><span> linked_list </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">= </span><span>linked_list.behind\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">else</span><span>:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">if </span><span>i </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">&lt; </span><span>index:\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">raise </span><span style=\"font-style:italic;color:#66d9ef;\">Exception</span><span>(</span><span style=\"color:#ae81ff;\">404</span><span>)\n</span><span> </span><span style=\"color:#f92672;\">return </span><span>linked_list\n</span></code></pre>\n<p>ä»¥ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰æºä»£ç å‡åœ¨<a rel=\"nofollow\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%84\">æ•°æ®ç»“æ„</a>ã€<a rel=\"nofollow\"
